amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following new section: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Department of Defense for sponsorship of NASCAR race cars.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 50 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used for the Department of Defense sponsorship of NASCAR race cars.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A082) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 281 (Roll no. 90).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A082) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 281 (Roll no. 90).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A082) offered by Ms. McCollum.
